mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user (uid, ex_key, provider, upw, unm, age, unn, profileImg, auth) VALUES (#{uid}, #{ex_key}, #{provider}, #{upw}, #{unm}, ${age}, #{unn}, #{profileImg}, #{auth})
mapper.delete: delete from t_user where uid = #{uid} and upw = #{upw}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(A.i_user) FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_review B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_user = ${i_user}) AS countMyReview, (SELECT COUNT(A.i_user) FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_review_cmt B ON A.i_user = B.i_user WHERE A.i_user = ${i_user}) AS countMyReviewCmt, (SELECT COUNT(A.i_user) FROM t_user A INNER JOIN t_reply B ON A.i_user = B.i_reply_user WHERE A.i_user = ${i_user}) AS countMyReply;
